About Me

Hello, my name is Diego, I am a computer engineering student in the last year of my degree. I have been studying computer science for nearly 9 years, during that time I have engaging in numerous projects that have enabled me to develop both soft and technical skills. Notably, I have developed strong competencies in teamwork, adaptability, and self-learning.

In terms of programming, I am skilled in several languages, including Python, JavaScript, PHP, SQL and C/C++.

Projects

Votting App

Survey about Dogs vs Cats

This project was developed for a fault tolerance class and implemented a microservices architecture. It was created and deployed in a sandbox environment on Red Hat OpenShift. The project is a web application for answering and viewing the result of a simple survey. Each microservice was developed using multiple technologies, including Node.js, Python, JavaScript and PostgreSQL.
